Detailed Description

template<typename T, typename R>
class roboptim::retargeting::TorqueMetapod< T, R >

Torque position computed through Metapod.

You *have* to make sure that your model root joint is a floating joint here.

Template Parameters:
TFunction traits type
RRobot type
